list.name: Lou Yixiao
list.text: Chaoshan cuisine is so delicious. After overeating, I had to walk back to the hotel on foot in order to wear a performance dress tomorrow, and exercise while walking. Don't praise me for my dedication. After all, I still want to eat after the rehearsal Supper. [Yun Bei] Do you have any recommended food?

list.name: Food Raiders
list.text: Hot and sour rice noodles, the taste is not inferior to the stalls outside, the homemade clean and hygienic, delicious and gluttonous! [Gluttony] #不可住的美食#

list.name: Travel Recording Bacteria
list.text: 【Getaria Town, Spain】Getaria Town is the seafood kitchen of Spain. It is famous for its rich seafood. The quantity of small squid and halibut produced in the Bay of Biscay is astonishing. There are a wide variety of grilled seafood. Traveling to Getaria, we can enjoy delicious food, wear cream-colored cashmere outfits like the locals, squeeze into steakhouses and munch on steaks, indulging in a carnival with Spanish characteristics.

list.name: Rebellious Performance Art
list.text:
The benefits of staying up late
1. Many people like to post their secrets in the middle of the night, and they can collect a lot of Renaissance emotional quotes and non-mainstream sentences, just like browsing Netease cloud hot reviews
2. Various gourmets and The sommelier will post the location, the place where Amway will drink and eat next time
3. When playing games, you will rarely encounter boosters, and the interaction with teammates will be reduced a lot. There is a very harmonious game atmosphere (except for Zaun people)
4. You can see the flags set by many people, such as never drinking alcohol, never staying up late, and must lose weight tomorrow (you can take screenshots, and post screenshots next time to slap your face)
5. The most important point is that staying up late is really cool

list.name: Eclipse
list.text: I finally finished the strategy of cured meat and pickled vegetables! Soy sauce meat is the most charming thing in winter, pickled vegetables are also super delicious, crisp and tender, I will post a video later to kill you, I want to Hands up.

list.text: #食品# The newly released two-dimensional hamster~~~It has turned into a girl's heart~~~~[Applause]

list.name: Luo Shifen's Royal Dining Room
list.text:
Luo Shifan's Yushanfang[笑haha][笑haha]#罗云冬#
Yushanfang’s small food class today!
Yushanfang’s gourmet braised pork ribs today!
How to make braised pork ribs!
Step 1 , Cut the ribs into pieces and wash them for later use
Step 2, put the ribs in the pan under cold water, add sliced ginger, a little Chinese prickly ash, and boil the cooking wine!
Step 3, rinse again and dry the water for later use!
Step 4, pour the oil into the pan Stir-fry rock sugar in an appropriate amount of oil to make the sugar color!
Step 5, pour in the ribs and stir fry evenly
Step 6, add shredded ginger, star anise, cinnamon and stir fry evenly!
Step 7, pour in the water that has not covered the ribs, add Dark soy sauce, add appropriate amount of salt to taste!
Step 8, boil on high heat and cook on medium heat for about an hour!
Step 9, cook until the soup is thick, and use high heat to collect the juice!
Have you learned it yet? Cloud Xi, would you like a copy! @罗云冬Leo

#美食#
